name: Hourglass (itch) (thirdoul)
description:
Hourglass is a hastily thrown together hodgepodge of ideas where your goal is to make it to the end of each level while constantly navigating the time-shifting architecture of your surroundings.

Shift objects around in time to help you navigate, but be fast! Changing an object's position in the future won't change it in the past. That useful box might jump to a previous spot if you're not cautious!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • R to reset the current level

This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam, please rate it there!
